title: Sensor Measurement Open Data
description: Sensor measurements from cities all over Europe

cities.description: Represents a list of European cities and their measurements.

items.description: Represents one individual city and its measurements.

country.description: Represents a country where a given city situated.

area.description: Represents an area in square kilometers for a given city.

elevation.description: Represents average elevation from sea level in meters for a given city.

population.description: Represents a population for a given city.

timezone.description: Represents a timezone for a given city.

region.description: Represents a region within the country where a given city is situated.

measurements.description: Represents a list of measurements for a given city.

timestamp.description: Represents time and date when the given measurement was taken.

temperature.description: Represents sensor temperature reading for a given measurement.

humidity.description: Represents sensor humidity reading for a given measurement.

pressure.description: Represents sensor pressure reading for a given measurement.
